titleStmt.title: SII 6.48: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 48. (A.R. No. 96 of 1897). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE KAILASANATHA TEMPLE IN THE SAME VILLAGE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrājarājadevarkku yāṇṭu Irupattiraṇṭāvatiṉ Etirāmāṇṭu miṉṉāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu ye veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aviṭṭattu nāḷ cuttavallivaḷanāṭṭut taṉiyūr śrīrājādhi
rājaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār rājādhirājiśvaramuṭaiyār koyilil Iruntu Iṉṉāṭṭup pāmpuṇikkūṟṟattu Akaram tiruñāṉacampantaccaturvvedimaṅkalattu sabhaiyārum mahāsabhai
yārum jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻapperiḷamaināṭṭum Irājādhirājapperiḷamaināṭṭum nālāyirap periḷamaināṭṭum Āḷappiṟantāṉperiḷamaināṭṭum gaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻapperiḷamaināṭṭavarro
ṭum kūṭa Iruntu vyavastai paṇṇiṉapaṭi ceṉṉirveṭṭi ceyyummiṭattu Āḷākacceyyam tirumukattevai ceyyummiṭattu kāveri Āṟṟaṅkaraikaraikkuk kuṭippaṟṟāṉa nilattāl kollaṟai ceyyakkaṭavarkaḷā
kavum nikki varum tirumukattevaikku Āḷāy vantatu Ūṇopāti ceyyakaṭavarkaḷākavum peruṅkuṭikaḷperāl kaṭamaikku veḷḷāḻaraic ciṟaipiṭittal Ivarkaḷ Akaṅkaḷil Oṭukkutal ceyyakkaṭavatallātā
kavum parampil nelluṅ kācum veḷḷāḷar pakkal niyeraka meḻuti koḷḷakkaṭavatallātākavum ciṟumuṟi kācu Iṭakkaṭavārallavākavum sabhāviniyokam varikkoḷḷummiṭattu maṭakku Oru māvukku kār nāṟpatum pacāṉam Eṇpapatum varikkoṇṭu Iṟukkakkaṭavomākavu
m kūṭa viniyokattukku Ulakuṭaiyaperumāḷ prasādamñceytaruḷi niṉaippiṭṭapaṭi Iṟukkakkaṭavomākavum Itukku melppaṭa celavaḻiya veṇṭittuṇṭākil mahāsabhāniyokam Eḻuti nilam ppaṭiyum kuṟailaṟa Eḻuttiṭuvittukkoṇṭu celavaḻippa
tākavum mutalikaḷpakkalap pukku brāhmaṇarātal veḷḷāḻar Ātalk kaṇakkar Ātal Ūṟkkeṭu nāṭṭukeṭu poṟkeṭu conṉār Uṇṭākil kirāmatturokikaḷum nāṭṭutturokikaḷumāy Ivarkaḷ paṭṭateṇṭam paṭakkaṭavakaṭavarkaḷākavum Ippaṭi sammatit
tu mahāsabhāvyavasthai paṇṇi Uṭaiyār śrīkaiyilāsamuṭaiyarrāṉa Irājādhirājīśvaramuṭaiyār koyililuma vaṇṭuvarāpati maṉṉaṉār koyililum kalveṭṭa conṉom Ippaṭi peruṅkuṟipperumakkaḷ tiruviḷḷamāka Itu Eḻutinen Ivvūr
Ūrkkaṇakku cekaluṭaiyāṉ tanmapiriyan Eḻuttu kaṇakku kiḻaiyiluṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 6.48 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
